content.question: The sculpture was created by a

choices.label: queen and her sisters as part of her coronation
military leader before going into battle for the first time
carver and a specialist combining elements of form and substance
group of blacksmiths at a family shrine

content.answer: carver and a specialist combining elements of form and substance

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
